Name: 1_lawyers_clients_privacy_confidentiality
Representative_Docs: ['confidentiality privacy and data protection the use of by lawyers poses risks to the preservation of client privilege confidentiality of privileged and other communications between lawyers privacy and data protection obligations', 'general precautions and ethical use of lawyers should that activities carried out by any are traceable including through log registration and where possible by recording input data user prompts ii take enhanced measures to protect the cybersecurity of data being processed with pay particular attention to the use of not provided by rable source and iv be aware that use of any carries without limitation risk of infringement of ip rights disclosure of trade secrets infringement of privacy and data protection rights as well as infringement of rules regulations laws relating to defamation discrimination and insider trading', 'when using lawyers should therefore always review the terms and conditions of the chosen to determine how it will use the entered therein ii whenever possible opt for that do not retain entered by the lawyer or that just retain and use that for the benefit of the user and that will not share such with others whenever the conditions under ii can not be fulfilled anonymize all data and that might in any way identify clients specific matters and iv in any case avoid sharing with particularly sensitive such as health data passwords trade secrets etc']
